etymology.description: Depicts a long object, originally a long body or vessel -> long
etymology.interpretation: The character 镸(長) (cháng, 'long') visually represents the concept of length, resembling an elongated form. This image embodies the essence of length or extension in time and space.

examples.chinese: 从学校到家距离很镸(長)，步行需要半小时(半小時)。
examples.pinyin: Cóng xuéxiào dào jiā jùlí hěn cháng, bùxíng xūyào bàn xiǎoshí.
examples.english: The distance from school to home is very long, and it takes half an hour to walk.
